issues.name: PHD Registration
reply: Go to PHD office Mon-Fri
Visit the PHD registration portal or office for assistance
For PhD registration, check the official guidelines posted at the PHD office

issues.name: Leave
reply: Go to the Student Disciplinary Office Mon-Fri.
Visit the official expulsion portal or speak with an office representative for guidance.
For details on expulsion procedures, check the official guidelines posted at the Disciplinary Office.

issues.name: Housing
reply: You will sooner get expelled than get your contract renewed
For housing issues, contact the housing department immediately
Please consult the housing office for updates on your contract

issues.name: Enrolment
reply: If you wish to enrol for the first time, go to admissions.uni.lu
Please visit admissions.uni.lu for first-time enrolment procedures
For new student enrolment, follow the guidelines on admissions.uni.lu

issues.name: Reenrolment
reply: If you wish to get reenrolled, go to admissions.uni.lu
For reenrolment procedures, refer to admissions.uni.lu
Reenrolment inquiries should be directed to admissions.uni.lu

issues.name: Residence permit
reply: If you wish to update your residence permit, go to admissions.uni.lu
For residence permit updates, please visit admissions.uni.lu
Consult admissions.uni.lu for any changes regarding your residence permit

issues.name: Mobility
reply: If you wish to get reenrolled, go to admissions.uni.lu
For mobility and exchange programs, please visit admissions.uni.lu
Check admissions.uni.lu for details on mobility programs

issues.name: Diploma retrieval
reply: If you wish to get your diploma, go to admissions.uni.lu
Diploma retrieval information can be found at admissions.uni.lu
For diploma and certificate queries, check admissions.uni.lu

issues.name: Graduation information
reply: If you wish to get your diploma, go to admissions.uni.lu
Graduation details are available at admissions.uni.lu
For information regarding graduation, please refer to admissions.uni.lu

issues.name: Salary slips
reply: If you wish to get your salary slips, go to admissions.uni.lu
Salary slip requests should be directed to admissions.uni.lu
For salary and payroll queries, check admissions.uni.lu

issues.name: CNS
reply: If you wish to get your CNS card updates, go to admissions.uni.lu
For CNS card information, please consult admissions.uni.lu
Check admissions.uni.lu for updates on your CNS card

issues.name: Library Access
reply: For library access and book loans, please visit the library office or website
Check the library portal for borrowing guidelines and resource availability
Visit the library for information on accessing study materials

issues.name: IT Support
reply: For IT support, please contact the IT helpdesk at uni.lu
Technical issues can be addressed by reaching out to the IT support team
For computer or login problems, please consult the IT helpdesk

issues.name: Financial Aid
reply: For financial aid queries, check the financial aid office website or contact them directly
Visit the financial aid office for information on scholarships and grants
Financial assistance details can be found on the official financial aid portal

greeting: Hello, what do you need help with?
Hi there, how can I assist you today?
Greetings, please let me know how I can help.
not_understand: I'm sorry, could you please clarify your question?
I don't understand the meaning of that..
Could you please provide more details?
I'm having trouble understanding, could you rephrase?
cannot_help: I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I can't help you today
Unfortunately, I'm not able to assist with that request.
I apologize, but that request is beyond my current capabilities.
more_help: Great, do you need my help with something else?
Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Feel free to ask if you have any more questions.
goodbye: Thank you for using our SEVE chatbot, don't hesitate to contact me if you have any other questions.
Thank you for reaching out, have a wonderful day!
